title: Sofa
description: A comfortable three-seater sofa with plush cushions and a modern design.

title: Dining Table
description: A large wooden dining table that seats up to six people, perfect for family meals.

title: Office Chair
description: An ergonomic office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support for long hours of work.

title: Bookshelf
description: A tall bookshelf with five spacious shelves for organizing books and decor items.

title: Coffee Table
description: A stylish coffee table with a tempered glass top and a lower storage shelf.

title: Bed Frame
description: A sturdy queen-sized bed frame with a sleek upholstered headboard.

title: Wardrobe
description: A spacious two-door wardrobe with hanging space and drawers for clothes storage.

title: TV Stand
description: A modern TV stand with open shelving and cable management features.

title: Armchair
description: A cozy armchair with padded armrests and a reclining function for added comfort.

title: Bar Stool
description: A set of two bar stools with a minimalist design and adjustable height.
